headline: Further Partners with Behr Paint Company to Reduce Decision Fatigue with New AI-Powered Paint Color Selection Tool
summary: The user-friendly solution guides prospective buyers through curated recommendations to find a color they loveAtlanta, Sept. 03, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Further, a leading data, cloud, and AI company focused on helping companies turn raw data into the right decisions, announced it is the AI company that developed Behr Paint Company’s new paint color selection generative AI experience, ChatHUE™. The tool is designed to remove key barriers in the paint color selection process to improve customer
